snippet.title: Michelle Wie’s LPGA Lotte Championship winner’s selfie says it all
snippet.description:
Michelle Wie’s LPGA Lotte Championship winner’s selfie says it all by Emily Kay on Apr 20 2014, 10:20a
This win was a long time coming for Wie.

snippet.title: Lydia Ko under fire for receiving subsidies from New Zealand government
snippet.description:
Lydia Ko under fire for receiving subsidies from New Zealand government by Emily Kay on Apr 17 2014, 2:42p
Lydia Ko has received negative press for receiving taxpayer funds, even though she did not apply for them personally and the subsidies began when she was still an amateur.

snippet.title: Bored by lackluster, Tiger Woods-free 2014 Masters? You were not alone
snippet.description:
Bored by lackluster, Tiger Woods-free 2014 Masters? You were not alone by Emily Kay on Apr 16 2014, 1:59p
The 2014 Masters produced very little buzz, and we have the numbers to prove it.

snippet.title: Reinvented Nets hope experience pays off in playoffs
snippet.description:
Reinvented Nets hope experience pays off in playoffs by SB Nation NBA Staff on Apr 17 2014, 10:46a
The Nets survived a slow start and a season-ending injury to Brook Lopez to reach the playoffs. Will a veteran lineup be able to find success now that they're here?

snippet.title: Tiger Woods likely to miss U.S. Open, team with Matt Kuchar for something called Americas Cup
snippet.description:
Tiger Woods likely to miss U.S. Open, team with Matt Kuchar for something called Americas Cup by Emily Kay on Apr 16 2014, 9:00a
The ‘window’s closing’ on Tiger Woods’ ability to break Jack Nicklaus’ record of 18 major titles, especially since he’ll likely miss the U.S. Open in June, says Woods’ confidante...

snippet.title: Tiger Woods never stood a chance, 'streaking' at Augusta and other things we learned at the Masters
snippet.description:
Tiger Woods never stood a chance, 'streaking' at Augusta and other things we learned at the Masters by Brendan Porath on Apr 15 2014, 11:12a
It was another long week at Augusta. Here are some of the things we took away from the 2014 Masters.

snippet.title: Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson era coming to an end at the Masters
snippet.description:
Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson era coming to an end at the Masters by Emily Kay on Apr 14 2014, 10:00a
Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson were nowhere in sight when Bubba Watson donned his second green jacket in three years, leaving Augusta watchers wondering if the fading superstars had made their last...

snippet.title: Bubba comin': Why Watson's 2014 Masters win is just the beginning
snippet.description:
Bubba comin': Why Watson's 2014 Masters win is just the beginning by Brendan Porath on Apr 14 2014, 9:00a
Bubba Watson put on a show at Augusta National last week, one we're going to see again in the future from a left-handed bomber who's playing a different course than everyone else.

snippet.title: Bubba Watson wins the 2014 Masters, captures 2nd green jacket in 3 years
snippet.description:
Bubba Watson wins the 2014 Masters, captures 2nd green jacket in 3 years by Emily Kay on Apr 13 2014, 6:54p
With all eyes on his 20-year-old playing partner, Jordan Spieth, Bubba Watson stole the spotlight and won his second Masters championship.

snippet.title: Why some are rooting against the divisive Bubba Watson on Sunday at the Masters
snippet.description:
Why some are rooting against the divisive Bubba Watson on Sunday at the Masters by Brendan Porath on Apr 13 2014, 2:39p
Bubba Watson is one of golf's most unique talents. He's got tons of game, and has plenty of fun off the course. But he's also got a history of actions and comments that have turned off many...
